NYU Steinhardt offers over 100 programs in teacher education, applied psychology,  the arts, communications, and health at the undergraduate and graduate level. Nearly all programs  integrate field-based learning through Steinhardt's extensive urban network  of internship, clinical fieldwork, or student teaching settings with intensive classroom-based  examination of related theories and concepts.
